impact-statement: Structural studies reveal the mechanism by which a HECT E3 ubiquitin ligase carries out E2-to-E3-to-substrate ubiquitin transfer and prioritizes target lysines for ubiquitination.

equal-contrib.equal-contrib: These authors contributed equally to this work

contribution.con1: HBK, Conceived and oversaw the study, generated reagents, performed crystallographic and biochemical experiments, and prepared the manuscript with contributions from all authors
contribution.con2: YQ, Performed mutational analysis and biochemical experiments, and prepared the manuscript with contributions from all authors
contribution.con3: AD, Generated, crystallized, and improved crystals for Rsp5<sup>WW3-HECT</sup>xUbxSna3<sup>C</sup>, and laid the groundwork for biochemical assays
contribution.con4: JSH, Performed computational modeling and edited the manuscript
contribution.con5: CM, Made constructs and strains, performed yeast genetic experiments, and edited the manuscript
contribution.con6: MA, Designed, synthesized, and purified the Sna3<sup>C</sup> peptide with a homobifunctional sulfhydryl crosslinker
contribution.con7: PR, Designed, synthesized, and purified the Sna3<sup>C</sup> peptide with a homobifunctional sulfhydryl crosslinker
contribution.con8: DJM, Refined crystal structures, and analyzed and interpreted the data
contribution.con9: JS, Developed expression systems and assays for the Rsp5 HECT domain
contribution.con12: NF, Oversaw generation of the peptide with a homobifunctional sulfhydryl crosslinker
contribution.con13: MH, Performed biophysical analyses on Rsp5 complexes
contribution.con10: SML, Made algorithmic changes to Rosetta required for modeling the Rsp5∼Ub-Sna3C catalytic center
contribution.con11: IK, Assisted with crystallography, analysis, and interpretation of data
contribution.con16: BAS, Provided guidance and oversight, assisted with crystallographic experiments and with designing and interpreting biochemical data, and prepared the manuscript with contributions from all authors
contribution.con14: RP, Oversaw yeast genetics experiments, and helped prepare the manuscript
